org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss
Interface DeploymentManagerMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeploymentManagerMBeanImpl
public interface DeploymentManagerMBean

Method Summary
 void clusterInstall(java.net.URL deployableUnitURL)
          Deploys a DU from a remote or local location in a persistent way to the whole cluster by copying it to JBOSS_HOME/server//farm folder.
 void clusterUninstall(java.net.URL deployableUnitURL)
          Undeploys a cluster-wide deployed DU by deleting it from the server farm folder.
 void persistentInstall(java.net.URL deployableUnitURL)
          Deploys a DU from a remote or local location in a persistent way, ie, copying it to JBOSS_HOME/server//deploy folder.
 void persistentUninstall(java.net.URL deployableUnitURL)
          Undeploys a persistently deployed DU by deleting it from the server deploy folder.
 java.lang.String showStatus()
          Displays information regarding the JBoss JAIN SLEE DU Deployer, providing information regarding deployed DU's and others with missing dependencies.
 

Method Detail

showStatus

java.lang.String showStatus()
Displays information regarding the JBoss JAIN SLEE DU Deployer, providing information regarding deployed DU's and others with missing dependencies.

Returns:
a HTML string with the current status information

persistentInstall

void persistentInstall(java.net.URL deployableUnitURL)
                       throws org.jboss.deployers.spi.DeploymentException
Deploys a DU from a remote or local location in a persistent way, ie, copying it to JBOSS_HOME/server//deploy folder.

Parameters:
deployableUnitURL - the URL to the DU to be deployed
Throws:
org.jboss.deployers.spi.DeploymentException - if it's not possible to deploy this DU

persistentUninstall

void persistentUninstall(java.net.URL deployableUnitURL)
                         throws org.jboss.deployers.spi.DeploymentException
Undeploys a persistently deployed DU by deleting it from the server deploy folder.

Parameters:
deployableUnitURL - the URL to the DU to be undeployed
Throws:
org.jboss.deployers.spi.DeploymentException - if it's not possible to undeploy this DU

clusterInstall

void clusterInstall(java.net.URL deployableUnitURL)
                    throws org.jboss.deployers.spi.DeploymentException
Deploys a DU from a remote or local location in a persistent way to the whole cluster by copying it to JBOSS_HOME/server//farm folder.

Parameters:
deployableUnitURL - the URL to the DU to be deployed
Throws:
org.jboss.deployers.spi.DeploymentException - if it's not possible to deploy this DU

clusterUninstall

void clusterUninstall(java.net.URL deployableUnitURL)
                      throws org.jboss.deployers.spi.DeploymentException
Undeploys a cluster-wide deployed DU by deleting it from the server farm folder.

Parameters:
deployableUnitURL - the URL to the DU to be undeployed
Throws:
org.jboss.deployers.spi.DeploymentException - if it's not possible to undeploy this DU
